```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(FactoMineR)
library(FactoMineR2)
```


```{r}
data(decathlon)

df <- decathlon |>
  select(1:10)
```


```{r}
### Eigs for FactoMineR

res_pca <- df |>
  PCA(scale.unit = TRUE, ncp = 5, graph = FALSE)

head(res_pca$eig, 5)
```


```{r}
### Eigs for FactoMineR2

eigs <- df |>
    standardize(type = "norm") |>
    get_eig()

eig <- eigs |>
  extract(1) |>
  as.data.frame() |>
  rename(eigenvalue = values) |>
  mutate(
    `percentage of variance` = eigenvalue / sum(eigenvalue),
    `cumulative percentage of variance` = cumsum(`percentage of variance`) * 100
  )
  
head(eig, 5)
```


```{r}
### Return coordinates for individuals in FactoMineR

res_pca$ind |>
  extract2(1) |>
  head(5)
```
